title: The Enchanted Book
description: Jimmy Evans has less than a year left to graduate from high school and move into his dream college, but relies on his stepfather's support to achieve his dream. In his struggle to enter college, he comes across a special book, and a gorgeous girl. These two are linked in a way even young Jimmy doesn't know, until he finds himself in need of both of them.The Enchanted Book is a typical Cinderella story with a twist. Cover art: Hannah SherDesigned by Kelvin O'Ralph
author: Kelvin O'Ralph
